name: Mini Retro Racing 3D
description:
Would you like be a champion of Retro Racing 3D?

Speed up and drive through stunningly vertiginous landscapes in retro automobiles!
Travel! Drive as far and as fast as you can!
Don`t stop!
But you must beware of barriers on crossy road!

Retro Racing 3D Game Features:
+ cool levels landscapes!
+ retro 3d runner!
+ real crossy road!
+ mountain and winter tracks!

Try it now! Be a real Retro Racing driver!
